description: Fundaec, an NGO based in Cali, Colombia, has been dedicated to rural development through education for over 50 years. Their current initiative, "Growing Hope," supports four communities in transitioning to regenerative agriculture. This multifaceted project includes a demonstration farm for training, satellite farms for local farmers, and educational programs in schools to enhance nutrition and agricultural knowledge. It emphasizes community involvement and aims to empower individuals to take charge of their development.
name: Growing Hope General
